name: BECOME — 12 Week Fat-Loss Foundation Program
description: 12-week, 4x/week program. Build foundational strength, lose fat, improve conditioning, develop exercise consistency.
goal: Build foundational strength, lose fat, improve conditioning, develop exercise consistency.

phases.focus: Movement quality, perfecting form, building a base of strength + conditioning.
Increase weights, increase volume, add slightly harder conditioning.
Peak results: highest volume, higher intensity, harder conditioning to finish strong.

exercises.name: 10-Minute AMRAP (non-athletic)
exercises.details: Air Bike 10 cals → Kettlebell Carry 30s → Rest 30s (repeat)

name: 30-Day Shred
description: 4-week, 5x/week program. Rapid fat loss and conditioning with safe, low-impact high intensity training.
goal: Rapid fat loss and conditioning with safe, low-impact high intensity training.

phases.focus: High intensity, metabolic conditioning, strength maintenance.

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.details: Chest up, Knees track, Sit back

exercises.name: Metabolic Finisher: AMRAP 10
exercises.details: 8 KB Swings, 12 Step-Back Burpee, 150m Row or 12 cal bike

exercises.name: HIIT Circuit (4 Rounds)
exercises.details: 40s work / 20s rest. 1. Assault bike/row, 2. DB Thrusters, 3. Walking Lunges, 4. Plank to Push-Up

exercises.name: Incline DB Row or Cable Row
Conditioning Ladder (EMOM 10)
exercises.details: Min 1: Row 12-14 cal, Min 2: 10 Push-Ups, Min 3: 15 Russian Twists, Min 4: Rest

exercises.name: Metabolic Circuit (3 Rounds)
exercises.details: Sled push or 20 cal bike, 12 Step-Back Burpees, 20 Russian deadlift (light). Rest 60-75s between rounds.

exercises.name: Intervals
exercises.details: 10 rounds 30s on / 30s off. Modalities: Bike, Row, Ski erg.

exercises.name: Core Finisher (3 Rounds)
exercises.details: 30s hollow hold, 30s side plank each side, 15 slow V-ups

name: Strength & Size 2.0
description: 4-week, 4x/week program. 4-day Upper/Lower split focused on strength and hypertrophy.
goal: 4-day Upper/Lower split focused on strength and hypertrophy. Daily ab finishers. Optional conditioning. Supersets included only for accessory work.

phases.focus: 4-day Upper/Lower split focused on strength and hypertrophy. Daily ab finishers. Optional conditioning. Supersets included only for accessory work.

name: No Excuses: At-Home Transformation
description: 4-week, 4x/week program. Fat loss, conditioning, functional strength, core stability.
goal: Fat loss, conditioning, functional strength, core stability

phases.focus: Fat loss, conditioning, functional strength, core stability

name: DB Only: Total Transformation
description: 4-week, 4x/week program. Hypertrophy, fat loss, strength, conditioning.

exercises.name: AMRAP 6 minutes
exercises.details: ["10 Jumping Lunges or Reverse Lunges","10 DB Thrusters","10 DB Swings"]

exercises.name: DB Floor Press or Bench Press
DB Complex — 5 Rounds
exercises.details: ["5 Dumbbell Deadlifts","5 Dumbbell Rows","5 Dumbbell Hang Cleans","5 Dumbbell Push Press"]

name: 30-Minute Dumbbell-Only Program
description: 4-week, 4x/week program. A fast, efficient 4-day dumbbell-only program designed for fat loss, muscle tone, and improved conditioning.
goal: A fast, efficient 4-day dumbbell-only program designed for fat loss, muscle tone, and improved conditioning. Every workout is capped at 30 minutes with minimal rest and simple dumbbell movements.

phases.focus: A fast, efficient 4-day dumbbell-only program designed for fat loss, muscle tone, and improved conditioning. Every workout is capped at 30 minutes with minimal rest and simple dumbbell movements.
